Accession	P62633;A8K7V4;B2RAV9;B4DP17;D3DNB9;D3DNC0;D3DNC1;E9PDR7;P20694;Q4JGY0;Q4JGY1;Q5QJR0;Q5U0E9;Q6PJI7;Q96NV3
EntryName	CNBP_HUMAN
ProteinName	CCHC-type zinc finger nucleic acid binding protein (Cellular nucleic acid-binding protein) (CNBP) (Zinc finger protein 9)
GeneName	CNBP RNF163 ZNF9
Length	177
Function	Single-stranded DNA-binding protein that preferentially binds to the sterol regulatory element (SRE) sequence 5'-GTGCGGTG-3', and thereby mediates transcriptional repression (PubMed:2562787). Has a role as transactivator of the Myc promoter (By similarity). Binds single-stranded RNA in a sequence-specific manner (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm; Endoplasmic reticulum; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm; Cytoplasm
